Question: The motion picture grossed well over US$200 million and this person was nominated for a Golden Globe.
Hints: On December 13, 2008, this person guest starred on The Naked Brothers Band, a Nickelodeon rock- mockumentary television show.
While on Broadway, this person's performance caught the eye of director Steven Spielberg.
This person has received two Academy Award nominations, for The Color Purple and Ghost, winning for Ghost.
